thread.title: Alliance Tech to Sponsor and Exhibit at EVENTtech 2015
thread.title_full: Alliance Tech to Sponsor and Exhibit at EVENTtech 2015

title: Alliance Tech to Sponsor and Exhibit at EVENTtech 2015
text:
– 
Alliance Tech, an event technology solutions provider focused on business intelligence for trade shows, conferences and events, today announced that it is a bronze sponsor and exhibitor at the upcoming EVENTtech 2015 , the worlds only conference and exposition focused on using social media and technology to optimize live experiences. At EVENTtech 2015, the industrys only campus conference, sessions are always steps from tech demos, product test-drives and meetings with leading technology partners. A leading pioneer in RF technology, Alliance Tech will present its suite of solutions focused on marketing metrics for trade shows and events as a bronze sponsor in booth 3013, including, check-in and badging, attendance tracking and lead management. Attendees will experience how Alliance Techs metrics and analytics can help increase net new opportunities, cut down unnecessary costs, and increase ROI. The booth will feature Alliance Techs streamlined check-in and badging solution, Intelligent CHECK-IN as well as its attendance tracking and lead management solutions. See how easy it can be to use your handheld devices to capture session attendance and leads at your next event.
